dct_description_sm: Includes telephone directory and indexes to bus stations. Ancillary maps: Beijing shi jiao qu qi che lu xian tu -- Beijing shi chang tu qi che lu xian tu. Relevant buildings are shown pictorially. Colored illustration, tourist information, and 8 ancillary maps of tourist attractions on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: [Beijing, China] : Di tu chu ban she : Xin Hua shu dian Beijing fa xing suo fa xing, 1978.
